mapper.insert: insert IGNORE INTO userCar (userId,carId,createTime) values (#{userId}, 1, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE createTime=now()
insert IGNORE INTO userCar (userId,carId,createTime) values (#{userId}, 2, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE createTime=now()
